entry.title: Rose Vine Red Oilcloth Fabric
entry.summary:
Vendor: Oilcloth by the Yard
Type: Fabric
Price: 6.00

Only One Yard left!
This oilcloth is a border print. It is bordered on both the top and bottom, with the vines in the middle. Roses, vines and small hearts all so pretty to look at!
It's perfect for tablecloths and bags too!
100% Genuine Oilcloth Durable, Weatherproof, Washable.
Simply Wipe Clean With Soapy Sponge!

By The Yard - 47" wide - $6.00
Final sale, no refunds, returns or exchanges.
